name: Comment Author Role Label
author: Jeremy Roberts

sections.description: Adds a comment author label next to comments and allows you to customize the background color of the label for roles registered on your site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload comment-author-role-label unzipped file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Select the background colors you want for each role on your site and save your changes.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload comment-author-role-label unzipped file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Select the background colors you want for each role on your site and save your changes.

Where is this added in the admin?

Under the Comments section labeled ‘Author Labels’.

short_description: Displays a user role next to the comment from a user registered on your site with the ability to customize a background color.
description: Adds a comment author label next to comments and allows you to customize the background color of the label for roles registered on your site.
